name: grido
author: Lucas Vilaboim <lucas@vilaboim.com> (http://vilaboim.com)
description: Grido is a grid developed between Star Wars Rebels and A New Hope (Han shot first!)

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "feat(version): release version %s" && npm run release:tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "feat(version): release version %s" && npm run release:tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "feat(version): release version %s" && npm run release:tags
